quest.name: An Eye for an Emblem
journal: The slight soldier has need of a hero's keen eyes.
objectives: Speak with the slight soldier in Monzen.
Survey the designated area for the gingko emblem.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: Hero of Eorzea, a moment. You do not know me─I am but one of many here─but I would beseech you your assistance in a...personal endeavor.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: Under hard years of imperial rule, the ancient and noble culture of Doma has begun to fade. Hoping to preserve some small part of it for posterity, I've been in search of a certain tome.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: Alas, as it presents no immediate benefit to our cause, my comrades have been less than cooperative in my efforts.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: If my own compatriots will not help me, I thought that mayhap a visitor will. If you are willing, pray meet me in Monzen.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: My thanks for coming. Now then, 'twould not do to be absent overlong, so let us set to work at once.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: Somewhere in Monzen, there is a manor that bears a gingko emblem. That is where the tome should be found. I would have you search for this emblem with me.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A gingko emblem adorns the gate.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: There is no gingko emblem in the area.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: You've found the manor? I shall go there at once!

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: I have it, Forename! The tome!

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: Oh, I'd love to pore over it right this moment, but 'tis past time we headed back. My shift is due to begin shortly, and there is also the matter of properly thanking you.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: I've since browsed the tome, and it is beyond worth. Words will not suffice to show my gratitude.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: The name will not be familiar to you, but this tome once belonged to a late lord of the Rokuyari family. When he stepped down from that role, he devoted his time to the study of herbs.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: In this tome he recorded innumerable plant varieties as well as those that he himself discovered, and lists in great detail their myriad properties. The knowledge will surely be of great benefit to all Domans.

dialogue.name: LADYSOLDIER02809
dialogue.text: Again, allow me to thank you. From the bottom of my heart.

obj.n: How Tataru Got Her Groove Back
